name: GloWars
description:
You were living peacefully, until enemies start to rise by the leader, Dark Orb!

You must fight back to finally conquer back the island!

Q&A

Q: How do I survive?

A: You would just need a little bit of protection. Thats all!

Q: What item do you need to win?

A: You would need to find a green orb!

Q: Why does it say Error when I click Continue?

A: It is because you would need GloWars+, or there is still more to come!

Q: I need more questions!

A: Go ahead and find a discussion board that says Q&A! (Not this one tho!)

NOTE: I am still working on GloWars+, so this will take a while!
